verbs.description: [ARG1: harrisburg] [V: awaits] [ARG2: pennsylvania senate act 47 bill approval] the city of harrisburg approved a bill on wednesday that would allow the city to keep its act 47 taxing authority for five more years some experts say that passing the bill will only help the city of harrisburg greater harrisburg association of realtors pennsylvania senate senator john disanto pittsburgh harrisburg president fish town philadelphia edwin tichenor pa bill 2557
